description:
Member of the Elite 13 of the Poseidal Military (Number 5). Chai Char is in command of the planet Koam and is Gavlet`s commanding officer when he is assigned to the Poseidal military. Chai becomes frustrated with Gavlet, as well as his superior Giwaza as a result of Gavlet`s constant failures. Once Daba and the others head to the planet Mizun, Chai follows and leads Poseidal`s forces against the rebels there. He pilots the Heavy Metal Bal-Bud.

Chai is killed in battle at the rebel`s Little Saye base. He is killed by Kyao, with whom he had conspired only recently before when Kyao was accused of being a spy by the rebels.
name: Chai Char
